ygData.subject: Re: So who got ROK?
ygData.msgSnippet: 1) all servers are at one place (San Diego) so should all be dependable as much as the next one. 2) This is a though question that noby really can
ygData.messageBody:
1) all servers are at one place (San Diego) so
should all be dependable as much as the next
one.<br><br>2) This is a though question that noby really can
answer. It comes down to what YOU like to play as.
However Start out your first character as a human
warrior. They are nightblidn wich really sucks but you
should see that character as a "throwaway" You will get
the hang of playing the game and interacting with the
game engine. Humans have the easiest newby area's and
least complicated cities, and warriors don't have to
worry about magic. So play one for a while till you
feel confident to start a real character.<br><br>3)
It's a long time since i played the tutorial :) but
it's all in there play it a couple of times... it
helps!<br><br>4) Not really. As a newby there will be newby
hunting ground where you can spend until lvlv 5 getting
exp. you can also do some simple quests getting exp
but most involve killing stuff. In the newby areas
there are guards that will help you if you are in
trouble. But you are never "safe" trying to get
exp.<br><br>5) I play on a PII 266 with a voodoo2 card and 160
MB RAM. The RAM made a HUGE different while playing.
I hardly lag anymore because of my system. On
Kunard however i need to turn my clipping rate down a
lot to be able to smoothly play. (under f10 then
options, display)<br><br>Good luck
